reviewText: dont buy ringer it doesnt not play on all dvd players and is in german only i was very disatifed with the dvd ringer movie ,from mike store and i couldn't find anywhere on amazon site that dvd ringer was in german check it out for yourself on amazon site i sure couldn't find the information the the dvd ringer was in german only and it says it is for all regions but it is not for all regions when i tryed to play the dvd ringer it said on screen the disc is not compatable never buying from this mikes store again,
